description:
11.27 chromanr
Reduce chrominance noise.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: chromanr

parameters.description: Set threshold for averaging chrominance values. Sum of absolute difference of Y, U and V pixel components of current pixel and neighbour pixels lower than this threshold will be used in averaging. Luma component is left unchanged and is copied to output. Default value is 30. Allowed range is from 1 to 200.
parameters.name: thres

parameters.description: Set horizontal radius of rectangle used for averaging. Allowed range is from 1 to 100. Default value is 5.
parameters.name: sizew

parameters.description: Set vertical radius of rectangle used for averaging. Allowed range is from 1 to 100. Default value is 5.
parameters.name: sizeh

parameters.description: Set horizontal step when averaging. Default value is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 50. Mostly useful to speed-up filtering.
parameters.name: stepw

parameters.description: Set vertical step when averaging. Default value is 1. Allowed range is from 1 to 50. Mostly useful to speed-up filtering.
parameters.name: steph

parameters.description: Set Y threshold for averaging chrominance values. Set finer control for max allowed difference between Y components of current pixel and neigbour pixels. Default value is 200. Allowed range is from 1 to 200.
parameters.name: threy

parameters.description: Set U threshold for averaging chrominance values. Set finer control for max allowed difference between U components of current pixel and neigbour pixels. Default value is 200. Allowed range is from 1 to 200.
parameters.name: threu

parameters.description: Set V threshold for averaging chrominance values. Set finer control for max allowed difference between V components of current pixel and neigbour pixels. Default value is 200. Allowed range is from 1 to 200.
parameters.name: threv

parameters.description:
Set distance type used in calculations.

‘manhattan’

Absolute difference.

‘euclidean’

Difference squared.

Default distance type is manhattan.
parameters.name: distance
